Detailed Description

===========================================================================

Introduction

Overview

This is the CSL-FL API documentation for the FSS and FSS_UL modules.

FSS/FSAS CSL-FL API usage If using the FSS module, there are 2 interfaces provided. These interfaces are defined in the CSL_FssInterfaceSelect enumerator as follows: a) CSL_FSS_INTERFACE_SELECT_FSAS - FSAS interface (to OSPI0 or HYPERBUS) b) CSL_FSS_INTERFACE_SELECT_FSS - FSS interface (to OSPI1)

If using the FSS_UL module, there is only 1 interface provided: a) CSL_FSS_INTERFACE_SELECT_FSAS - FSAS interface (to OSPI0)

The following FSS API functions require an ifSelect argument set to one of the values above:

  • CSL_fssCfgEcc
  • CSL_fssCfgEccRegion
  • CSL_fssSetIntrEnable
  • CSL_fssSetIntrPendingStatus
  • CSL_fssIsIntrPending
  • CSL_fssAckIntr
  • CSL_fssGetEccBlockErrorInfo
  • CSL_fssGetWrErrorInfo

The following is the recommended calling sequence to configure and enable each interface:

  1. Configure the desired ecc regions by calling CSL_fssCfgEccRegion
  2. If using the CSL_FSS_INTERFACE_SELECT_FSAS interface, call the CSL_fssSelectInterfacePath to select OSPI0 or HYPERBUS
  3. Configure desired interrupt support by calling CSL_fssSetIntrEnable
  4. Enable ecc functionality by calling CSL_fssCfgEcc with true

OTFA CSL-FL API usage The following is the recommended calling sequence to configure and enable the OTFA module:

  1. Confirm that crypto functionality is available by calling CSL_fssOtfaIsCryptoAvailable and checking if true is returned
  2. Configure the desired crypto regions by calling CSL_fssOtfaCfgCryptoRegion
  3. Configure the crypto functionality by calling CSL_fssOtfaCfgCrypto
  4. Configure desired interrupt support by calling CSL_fssOtfaSetIntrEnable
  5. Enable crypto functionality by calling CSL_fssOtfaSetCryptoEnable with true

Software can make changes to the OTFA configuration when it is enabled by following the protocol below:

  1. Pause the OTFA by calling CSL_fssOtfaSetCryptoPause with true
  2. Make desired changes to region configuration
  3. Resume the OTFA by calling CSL_fssOtfaSetCryptoPause with false

References

  • fss Module Specification, version 1.0.12.01
  • fss_ul Module Specification, version 1.1.0.03
  • otfa_l Module Specification, version 1.1.9
